item.title: Learning stuff: Pulumi for AWS
item.description: I decided to make a habit of learning at least one new tool, technology every month and prepare a blog post about it. In recent months I focused mostly on the stuff I was dealing at work. Right now I’m reading “Atomic Habits” by James Clear, so that’s the first habit I would like to create. :) What is Pulumi This month I decided to check out Pulumi. Pulumi is an open-source infrastructure as code tool.
